about_the_game:
Stranded on the dark side of the moon, you’re an astronaut facing the ultimate test of survival. The Unified Field Reactor, once a marvel of technology, has gone haywire, unleashing waves of energy that distort time, space, and reality itself. Meteor showers, moonquakes, and deadly radiation storms make every moment unpredictable. With your base in ruins and no rescue in sight, your only hope lies in your wits, and your determination. But can you trust its guidance, or does it have an agenda of its own?

Each mission thrusts you into a desperate struggle for survival. Scavenge oxygen from shattered corridors before suffocation claims you. Venture into hostile territory to retrieve vital equipment, dodging environmental catastrophes at every turn. Battle alien pincers and rogue androids with real-world cosmonaut weapons, from laser pistols to the devastating Jet Rocket Gun. But be warned: the enemies won’t wait for you to finish your tasks. They hunt you relentlessly, turning every second into a fight for your life.

This demo offers a glimpse into the action, featuring a select set of missions that showcase the intensity and challenges ahead. The stakes are clear: adapt, fight, and survive, or be consumed by the void. Get ready for a taste of the full three-episode game, packed with hours of immersive gameplay and relentless excitement! The moon isn’t just your battleground—it’s your greatest adversary. Will you conquer it, or will it conquer you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: When scientists resumed their Unified Field Theory experiments this time they succeeded- with devastating consequences. You are trapped on a desolate Lunar Base with only your wits, real world astronaut weapons and a heads up display to give you instructions.
